member.name: T:DeltaEngine.Multimedia.OpenTK.Helpers.IeeeFloatConverter
member.summary: Audio data converter capable of converting IEEE floating point audio to pcm 16 bit.

member.name: T:DeltaEngine.Multimedia.OpenTK.Helpers.MsAdpcmConverter
member.summary: Audio data converter capable of converting MS Adpcm audio to pcm 16 bit. http://wiki.multimedia.cx/index.php?title=Microsoft_ADPCM http://dslinux.gits.kiev.ua/trunk/lib/audiofile/src/libaudiofile/modules/msadpcm.c http://netghost.narod.ru/gff/vendspec/micriff/ms_riff.txt

member.name: T:DeltaEngine.Multimedia.OpenTK.Helpers.AudioFormat
member.summary: Audio formats depending on the number of channels and the bit-depth.

member.name: T:DeltaEngine.Multimedia.OpenTK.Helpers.WaveFormat
member.summary: All wave formats we're currently able to parse which is read from the fmt chunk.

member.name: T:DeltaEngine.Multimedia.OpenTK.Helpers.WaveSoundData
member.summary: Helper class to parse the headers and chunks of a wave file and calling the needed converter classes.
